data.comment: The big names in today's match at Borås Arena have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Borås Arena.
In the minute 1, Kalmar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Elfsborg.
In the minute 4, Elfsborg have a dangerous throw-in.
Per Martin Melin awards the away team a throw-in.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 7, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Kalmar.
Elfsborg have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Goal kick for Kalmar at Borås Arena.
Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 12, Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
Throw-in for Kalmar at Borås Arena.
In Boras Kalmar attack through Sebastian Ring. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Elfsborg goal kick.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Kalmar in the half of Elfsborg.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
In the minute 22, Rasmus Alm (Elfsborg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Frederik Holst.
In the minute 23, Great play from Joseph Okumu to set up the goal.
Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Boras.
In the minute 26, Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Jeppe Okkels extends Elfsborg's lead to 2-0.
Rasmus Alm with an assist there.
In the minute 28, Can Elfsborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kalmar's half?
Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
Elfsborg push upfield but Per Martin Melin quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 32, Per Martin Melin awards Kalmar a goal kick.
Free kick Kalmar.
In Boras a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 35, Throw-in Elfsborg.
Elfsborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Kalmar in the half of Elfsborg.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Kalmar at Borås Arena.
Free kick Kalmar.
Elfsborg to take a throw-in in Kalmar territory.
In the minute 37, Per Martin Melin signals a Elfsborg throw-in in Kalmar's half.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
Can Elfsborg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kalmar's half?
In the minute 39, Per Martin Melin awards Kalmar a goal kick.
Per Martin Melin awards the away team a throw-in.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Elfsborg.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
Per Martin Melin awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Kalmar have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
Kalmar to take a throw-in in Elfsborg territory.
Can Kalmar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elfsborg's half?
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Boras.
Kalmar have a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Carl Gustafsson with Isak Jansson. This is the first substitution made today by Nanne Bergstrand.
In the minute 46, Edvin Crona is replacing Johan Stenmark for Kalmar at Borås Arena.
Free kick for Elfsborg in the half of Kalmar.
Kalmar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Gbenga Arokoyo is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Elfsborg in the half of Kalmar.
In the minute 49, Throw-in high up the field for Elfsborg in Boras.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Elfsborg.
Throw-in for Kalmar at Borås Arena.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
Per Martin Melin signals a Elfsborg throw-in in Kalmar's half.
In Boras a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 53, Leo Vaisanen (Elfsborg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 57, Elfsborg have been awarded a penalty...
Elfsborg have extended their lead to 3-0 courtesy of a Per Frick penalty.
Kalmar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Kalmar make their third substitution with Nils Froling replacing Geir Herrem.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Elfsborg at Borås Arena.
In the minute 61, Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
Samuel Holmen for Elfsborg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Kalmar at Borås Arena.
In the minute 63, Can Kalmar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elfsborg's half?
Free kick for Kalmar in the half of Elfsborg.
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 64, Kalmar's Isak Magnusson has been booked in Boras.
Elfsborg's Per Frick gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kalmar defender.
Kalmar needs to be cautious. Elfsborg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 66, Elfsborg's Rasmus Alm breaks free at Borås Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Boras.
Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 67, Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Elfsborg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jimmy Thelin is making the team's first substitution at Borås Arena with Jacob Ondrejka replacing Jeppe Okkels.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
In the minute 72, Gbenga Arokoyo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 73, Gbenga Arokoyo is back on the pitch.
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
Nanne Bergstrand (Kalmar) is making a fourth substitution, with Emin Nouri replacing Gbenga Arokoyo.
Throw-in for Kalmar in the half of Elfsborg.
In the minute 75, Kalmar's Edvin Crona gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Elfsborg goal kick.
In Boras Elfsborg attack through Rasmus Alm. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 76, Kalmar have a goal kick.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Elfsborg.
In the minute 77, Kalmar pushes forward through Erik Israelsson, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 3-1 through a header from Erik Israelsson.
Romarinho instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 80, Per Martin Melin awards the away team a throw-in.
The home team replace Samuel Holmen with Robert Gojani.
Ball goes out of play for a Kalmar goal kick.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Kalmar close to the penalty box.
Elfsborg push forward at Borås Arena and Johan Larsson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kalmar defence.
Kalmar's Piotr Johansson breaks free at Borås Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 83, Per Martin Melin awards Elfsborg a goal kick.
Nanne Bergstrand (Kalmar) is making a fifth substitution, with Filip Sachpekidis replacing Sebastian Ring.
Elfsborg drives forward and Jacob Ondrejka gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 86, Elfsborg's Rami Kaib gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Boras.
Per Martin Melin signals a Kalmar throw-in in Elfsborg's half.
In the minute 87, Goal kick for Kalmar at Borås Arena.
In Boras, Kalmar push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in Elfsborg.
In the minute 88, Simon Strand is replacing Rami Kaib for the home team.
Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Isaac Prince Kouame is on a sub for Per Frick for Elfsborg.
Elfsborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Boras.
Throw-in for Kalmar at Borås Arena.
Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
Per Martin Melin signals a throw-in for Elfsborg, close to Kalmar's area.
Elfsborg have a dangerous throw-in.
The match has come to a close in Boras. The final score is 3-1.
